ec.coevolve
Interface IncrementalFitness

All Known Implementing Classes:
IncrementalAveragedFitness
public interface IncrementalFitness

IncrementalFitness.java Incremental Fitness is an interface which defines a way that a fitness can be based on more than one assessment. Before assessments for an individual begin, preprocessFitness() is called. Then updateFitness() is called for each assessment. after all assessments are made, postprocessFitness() is then called.

Method Summary
 void postprocessFitness()
          A function to be called for finalizing the calculation of the fitness.
 void preprocessFitness()
          A function to be called before the repeated fitness assessment starts.
 void updateFitness(float newFitness)
          Update the cumulative fitness of the individual
